Entries.Kyle: That's pretty cool. Thanks.$h/-26 -7/Oh, thanks./-12 -81 -2/Why would I want this?/-80/...Get lost./-20/Uh, okay..?/-5 -6 -4 -79 -75 -27

Entries.5614141/F/f Kyle 1500: 50s/10 19/farmer 2 19 1 Kyle 11 17 1 Eden 13 17 3/skippable/animate Eden false true 500 16 17 18 19/move farmer 10 0 1/faceDirection farmer 0/message "Hi there! What are you two up to?"/pause 500/speak Kyle "Eden is forcing me to model for his painting..."/pause 500/emote Eden 32/pause 500/speak Eden "I'm not forcing you to do anything!$1#$b#You just never reject me when I ask you!$1"/emote Kyle 12/pause 500/textAboveHead Kyle "Because I have to..."/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/textAboveHead Eden "Sure."/pause 1000/question null "...#Will you at least make his hair a normal color, Eden?#Will you at least give him better muscles, Eden?"/emote Kyle 12/textAboveHead Kyle "Very funny."/pause 1000/speak Eden "Oh, haha, I don't think so!$1#$b#I'm trying to make it as similar as I can...$1"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/message "Okay, good luck, I'll be going!"/emote Eden 32/textAboveHead Kyle "About time!"/pause 200/emote farmer 12/end

Entries.2201751/F/f Kyle 2000: 50s/17 8/farmer 17 14 0 Kyle 16 10 2/skippable/animate Kyle false true 500 16 16 17 17 18 18/move farmer 0 -3 0/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 16/pause 500/message "Oh, I'm sorry for interrupting... I'll see you later!"/pause 500/speak Kyle "You're not, I'm just working out.#$b#I could use some company.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/speak Kyle "So, are you doing alright on your farm?"/question null "...#Lots of hard work!#Oh, nothing interesting. You know how it is...#I'm doing okay."/speak Kyle "Yeah."/pause 500/emote Kyle 40/pause 500/speak Kyle "Did I ever tell you I used to do all that farm stuff, too?$1"/emote farmer 36/pause 500/speak Kyle "When I was younger, my caregiver would often take me to his parents.#$b#They were farmers, and had gigantic fields of crops...#$b#So naturally, I was soon their cheap labor...$1"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/message "You have some experience, then!"/speak Kyle "Yeah. It actually wasn't so bad.$1#$b#I guess now you know who's your go-to if you need help with your crops.$1#$b#Although, I still am a city guy at heart. I wouldn't miss farming if I moved back.$1"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/end

Entries.1003671/F/f Kyle 2500: 50s/69 12/farmer 68 14 1 Kyle 70 14 3/skippable/emote Kyle 40/pause 500/message "So, why did you need me here?"/pause 500/speak Kyle "I need to talk to you.#$b#Away from everyone.$3"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Kyle "I'm not going to go around the topic. I'll be straight-up with you."/pause 3000/textAboveHead Kyle "*sigh*"/pause 3000/speak Kyle "I'm into you.$3#$b#I tried to fight it, I tried to gaslight myself, but I can't anymore.#$b#I need to know how you feel because I'm genuienely going crazy over the past few days."/pause 3000/emote farmer 40/pause 3000/question null "What do you say?#I like you too.#I need to think about it...#Let's stay friends."/pause 500/speak Kyle "Cool.#$b#At least now I know where we stand.$1"/emote farmer 60/end

Entries.Kyle0: I can't believe this is happening...$1
Entries.Kyle1: I'm kind of nervous...#$e#You know, for our wedding...#$b#I don't think anyone expected a guy like me to be getting married.
